UniprotID	Q86VE0

EntryName	MYPOP_HUMAN
ProteinName	Myb-related transcription factor, partner of profilin (Myb-related protein p42POP) (Partner of profilin)
GeneName	MYPOP P42POP
Length	399
Function	Transcriptional repressor; DNA-binding protein that specifically recognizes the core sequence 5'-YAACG-3'. Dimerization with PFN1 reduces its DNA-binding capacity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
